analysis.key_quote: it wipes out institutional knowledge, which doesn’t just disrupt operations—it harms people. Career civil servants carry the history, systems expertise, and policy nuance that keep government running and responsive to real-world needs.
analysis.rationale: The comment clearly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about merit-based hiring, due process, politicization of civil service roles, and the loss of institutional knowledge, all of which align with the themes of opposition to the rule.
